title: Are management students even eligible for MRD/CNR scholarships?

comments.body: yeah, they are eligible and I know a couple who got it
Is it announced tho by pes ? Somewhere where we can see it like a list and how much scholarship they've got.
It's usually sent as an excel sheet to our mail
Names of people who have received any of the 3 scholarships... Basically a list of people all above 7.75 sgpa
You get 40% of your semester fees (In your case you get (0.4x180000=72000(
